name: WebGLRenderingContext.createShader
description: The WebGLRenderingContext method createShader() of the WebGL API creates a WebGLShader that can then be configured further using WebGLRenderingContext.shaderSource() and WebGLRenderingContext.compileShader().

refs.name: OpenGL ES 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glCreateShader' in OpenGL ES 2.0.
